text: Ana hu'neankino ana zupa tusi'a Kresramana vu ofa nehu'za, tusi musenkase hu'naze. Na'ankure Anumzamo ra muse'za zamige'za anara hu'naze. A'nene mofavre zagamo'za zamagranena tusi muse hu'naze. Ana nehazage'za Jerusalemi kumapima musenkasema hazazamofo agasasana, afete'ma mani'naza vahe'mo'zanena antahi'naze.
